bug.author: rkooo567
bug.summary: [Dashboard] Dashboard node stats not working properly.
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>What is the problem?</denchmark-h>
I found these logs from dashboard.err pretty easily. I guess some stuff is not properly parsed. <denchmark-code>KeyError: 'hostname' Traceback (most recent call last): File "/Users/sangbincho/work/ray/python/ray/dashboard/node_stats.py", line 255, in run self._node_stats[data["hostname"]] = data </denchmark-code>
